channel.title: personal on Palak Jain
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Palak Jain

item.title: Whisp - personal
item.description: Whisp is an android app written in Kotlin that simulates phone call between user and lost loved one to help with grieving process. It is inspired by Japan’s Phone of the Wind. The feeling of communication with a lost loved one can be a very beneficial and positive way of coping with loss. With deaths on the rise this year, I wanted to bring the magic and beauty of the Phone of the Wind to smartphones for greater accessibility.

item.title: TicTacToe - personal
item.description: This was my first go at a Java project after self-learning for a couple months! It was developed as a simple 2-player game of Tic Tac Toe on a text-based console. The code is broken up into 3 key classes: Main, Board, and Player. This project displays my competence in the basics of Java and object oriented programming. Check out the code on GitHub: https://github.com/pjain062700/TicTacToe
